certifications.name: Certified Tester Foundation Level (CTFL)
certifications.authority: ISTQB - International Software Testing Qualifications Board

company.name: ISTQB® - International Software Testing Qualifications Board

profile_positions.description:
Mastering Project Description

Mastering is a leading collection of online homework, tutorial & assessment products which is designed to improve the results of all higher education students in the world as well as in Sri Lanka. Mainly five user roles are interacting with mastering project as Operators,Authors, Instructors,Section Instructors and students with different privileges. More than 11 million students are annually using the Product. 

Mastering Biology - https://www.pearsonmylabandmastering.com/northamerica/masteringbiology/

Mastering content is used by different kind of integrations with their own Header,Left navigation,Footer and Registration process.

Main integrations are, 
MyLab & Mastering - https://www.pearsonmylabandmastering.com/global/ 
MyLabsPlus - https://mlpdemo-mlpui.openclass.com/ 
Blackboardlearn - https://pearsonintegrationqa2.blackboard.com/webapps/login/ 
D2L Learning Environment - https://pearsoned.d2l-partners.brightspace.com/d2l/login 
CANVAS - https://pearson.instructure.com/login/canvas
Moodle - http://moodle34prod.openclass.com/

Project Responsibilities

• Test designing.
• Test execution.
• Defect tracking.
• Defect mapping.
• Requirement mapping.
• Test plan preparation.
• Test case reviewing.
• Manual testing. -Perform manual testing /regression testing on web application,mobile applications with integration testing for couple of critical production releases .
• Automation testing. - Implementing the automation scripts for all automatable test cases.
• Compatibility testing. - Perform testing with latest operating systems and browser versions using Chrome Book,Laptops, Tabs,    Android phones and IOS Phones.
• API Testing - Postman.
* Writing & Executing Test Cases : ALM (Application lifecycle management).
* Project Management Tool : Jira.
* Bug Reporting Tool: Jira.
* Automation Tool: Selenium.
* Automation IDE : Eclipse.
* Computer programming: JAVA.
* Database Language: Oracle.
profile_positions.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for test designing, maintaining, executing tests, reporting bugs, retesting bug fixes, supporting regression testing and integration testing.
-Working with manual test team as well as performing writing automation scripts for in-Sprint automation.
-Mobile testing for mastering project with Android and iOS platforms.
- Performing All-Hands testing.
- Performance Testing.
Each release needs a performance test, based on the Implementation of new features. Team decides the necessity of the performance test and the performance testing type after having a discussion with development team and the Core team.Performance test Results are comparing between Baseline test results (before implementing the new feature) and latest test results (after implementing the new feature). Based on SLA (Service Level Agreements),performance test Results are approved by Product Owners and the management. If not approved, development team need to enhance the features until performance test get passed.
- Single User Performance testing - Fiddler
- Client- Side profiling – Lighthouse plugin.
- 1X,2X Performance Testing - JMeter and LoadRunner
• All-Hands Testing. - We are going to allocate a limited time, Get KTs (Knowledge Transforming) and test another Projects. Same time we are handling All-Hands testing for mastering project.
My responsibilities are,
-	Providing KTs about Mastering project.
-	Manually Testing other projects and finding bugs.
• Security testing – AppSpider Enterprise. 
Scheduled job is running on once a week and It covers most of the instructor and Student basic work flows, generate reports displaying vulnerabilities by risk under High/ Medium/ Low/ Informational categories.
   My responsibilities are,
-	Identifying and finalizing the flow which should covered through AppSpider.
-	Analyzing root causes If there are any failures in execution. 
-	Working with failure fixes.
-	Generating reports and analyzing results.
-	Sharing the results with Core Team.

Peoples bank is one of the top state owned commercial bank in Sri Lanka providing banking and treasury services over 58 years.
My  responsibilities are,
• Handling cash deposits, withdrawals.
• Handling payments like water bills, current bills, Internet bills etc.
• Handling check payments.
• Ensure end of day cash balancing and reconciliations.
• Checking bank documents and statements.
• Issuing Credit,Debit cards.
